Title: Relates to the Catskill regional off-track betting corporation; repealer
Summary: Relates to the Catskill regional off-track betting corporation including licensing, vendor fees, distribution of funds, collective bargaining, reporting and site approval.
LawCode: Amd §§1617-a & 1612, Tax L; rpld §1016 sub 1 ¶b, sub¶ 5 cl(E), sub¶ 6 cl(F), §1017 sub 2, amd RWB L, generally
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law and the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to the Catskill regional off-track betting corporation; and repealing certain provisions of the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law relating thereto
